LanguageData.BuildAssaultRifle.label: Build M16 Rifle
LanguageData.BuildAssaultRifle.description: Builds a general-purpose military assault rifle for field or urban combat. Fires a 3-round burst.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildSG553Gun.label: Build SIG SG553
LanguageData.BuildSG553Gun.description: The SIG SG553, a slightly improved version of the SG552, is the SBR (Short Barrel Rifle) version of the SIG SG550. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildAUG.label: Build Steyr AUG A3
LanguageData.BuildAUG.description: The Steyr AUG A3 is an Austrian bullpup 5.56×45mm NATO assault rifle, designed in the 1960s by Steyr Mannlicher GmbH. Average damage, good range, good accuracy and low rate of fire.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildSCAR_H.label: Build FN SCAR-H
LanguageData.BuildSCAR_H.description: The Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle (SCAR) is a gas-operated self-loading rifle with a rotating bolt. Good damage, good range, good accuracy and low rate of fire.\nCaliber: 7.62x51mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildFAMAS.label: Build FAMAS G2
LanguageData.BuildFAMAS.description: The FAMAS is a bullpup-styled assault rifle. Average damage and range, good rate of fire and accurracy.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildXM8MilitaryRifle.label: Build HK XM8 Military Rifle
LanguageData.BuildXM8MilitaryRifle.description: Builds the HK XM8 Military Rifle, an ancient pattern military weapon. Three-round burst. Good range, low power an high rate of fire.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildAK47Gun.label: Build AK-47
LanguageData.BuildAK47Gun.description: Builds the AK-47, a selective-fire, gas-operated assault rifle. Good damage, average range and rate of fire but poor accuracy.\nCaliber: 7.62x39mm Soviet
LanguageData.BuildTacticalCombatrifle.label: Build MA5 ICWS
LanguageData.BuildTacticalCombatrifle.description: Builds the MA5 Individual Combat Weapon System (MA5 ICWS or MA5 Assault rifle). It is a standard-issue service rifle of the UNSC Marines.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
LanguageData.BuildMarineSturmRifle.label: Build Tavor TAR-21
LanguageData.BuildMarineSturmRifle.description: Builds the Tavor TAR-21. Fires a 5 round burst.\nCaliber: 5.56x45mm NATO
